searchText.title: Search Text
searchText.description: Full-text search query to find economic data series. Searches across series titles, units, frequency, and tags. Example: 'cpi', 'unemployment', 'gdp'
searchText.sectionDescription: Specify what to search for. Use either search text or a specific series ID.

seriesId.title: Series ID
seriesId.description: Specific FRED series identifier. Use this to fetch a specific series by ID. Example: 'CPIAUCSL', 'UNRATE', 'GDP'

categoryId.title: Category ID
categoryId.description: Filter results by FRED category ID. Example: 10 (National Accounts), 1 (Production & Business Activity)
categoryId.sectionDescription: Refine your search results using these filters

searchType.title: Search Type
searchType.description: Type of search to perform. 'full_text' searches titles, units, frequency, and tags (default). 'series_id' searches only series IDs.
searchType.sectionDescription: Configure how to search and sort the results

includeObservations.title: Include Observations
includeObservations.description: Whether to include observation data (date-value pairs) for each series. This will fetch additional data and may increase processing time.
includeObservations.sectionDescription: Configure what data to include in the results

maxItems.title: Max Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of series to collect. Free users: Limited to 100. Paid users: Optional, max 1,000,000. Leave empty for unlimited (paid users only).
